Name: Major Pixel
Description: Major Pixel is a distinguished member of the WebtrES club, known for his unwavering loyalty to the digital realm. With an orange box chassis that has seen many a virtual battle, this pixelated veteran carries the classic screen face of an old-school arcade game, reminiscing about the golden era of gaming. His soldier-like buttons and limbs are a testament to his disciplined code of conduct and his ability to lead in times of cyber conflict. Major Pixel may look like a relic from a bygone era, but his strategic prowess and timeless wisdom make him a respected leader in the ever-evolving digital landscape.
